author: Space Wizards
install_msg: Thank you for our installing our repo! If you need support, You can ask in the #hosting channel on our official SS14 discord (For Space Station 14 related cogs).
name: Space Wizards Cogs
short: Useful cogs for server hosters for Space Station 14.
description: Useful cogs for server hosters to use on their Space Station 14 servers. An open source project based on the cult classic Space Station 13.
